Name: Battle Imagine - Inferno Goblin Mage
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Inferno Goblin Mage's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Falling Star.

Stunt! Falling Star
Transform into Elite: Inferno Goblin Mage and summons meteors from the sky, dealing Magic Damage.
Upon the skill cast, your Intellect is increased for a period.
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Inferno Goblin Mage's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Falling Star.

Stunt! Falling Star
Transform into Elite: Inferno Goblin Mage and summons meteors from the sky, dealing Magic Damage.

Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
